article_title: SC senator wants to take nullification out of anti-Obamacare bill
article_text: While South Carolina can’t stop the Affordable Care Act - also known as Obamacare - SC State senator Tom Davis said lawmakers can make it difficult for the law to succeed.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbia, SC, politics, Tom Davis, nullification, legislature, general assembly, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, Nikki Setzler
